description: Chris was crashing at Jordan's place for a couple of weeks. He came into town to stay with some friends but had a falling out and happened to meet up with Jordan when he was looking for a place to stay. Jordan decided to let Chris stay at his place because he thought Chris was hot. Little did Chris realize the price he would have to pay to stay at Jordan's apartment. Jordan's fee: sucking Chris's straight dick and getting fucked in the ass. Chris was a little apprehensive about it but once Jordan started sucking his dick, Chris was all about it. And judging by the massive load he shot, Chris had a blast.
title: Man Hunt
